short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searching and organizing your LinkedIn Saved Posts is a pain. LikedIn.io makes it so much easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LikedIn Chrome Extension enables you to search, tag and export your LinkedIn Saved Posts.

Used with likedin.io, you can search LinkedIn Saved Posts by keyword, username, post date, media type and tag.  You can also organize your Saved Posts into categories for easy retrieval.

Once the extension is installed, you will have the option of signing up for a likedin.io account.
